eqsusubed.jcr:title: Bear 8'8" Longboard
eqsusubed.features: Polyurethane foam. Super heavy glass with a nice gloss coat gives this board some durability and weight.
eqsusubed.reviews: By Plasma from San Jose, CA Great all round longboard. Good paddling and turning. Better in good waves due to large amount of rocker. Plenty of volume. Thick rails but the tail rocker means it turns well.
eqsusubed.summary: Whether you are looking for nose-riding time with smooth turns or making big cuts in smaller waves this board delivers. The board has great versatility for a longboard. Because the board is 8'8" it is small enough to handle slightly bigger waves but still

eqsusuchd.jcr:title: Chasing Tail Surfboard
eqsusuchd.features: Polyurethane, Balsa Wood High gloss finish
eqsusuchd.reviews: By surfersean20 from Kona The california typical day board.this thing is sick.great for huge airs ad big gouges.this board makes airs easy!!
eqsusuchd.summary: Full rails and extra flotation make this board ideal for mushed out summer waves.For the beginner to advanced surfer, this board works great in knee high to head high surf.

eqsusuely.jcr:title: El Greco 8' Shorty
eqsusuely.features: EPS foam core with high density polyurethane band around the rails Glassed with a Salmon Skin technology to provide durability without compromising flexibility
eqsusuely.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review
eqsusuely.summary: The El Greco has blended the nose riding capabilities of a longboard together with the maneuverability and speed of a shortboard. It's not a long short board, it's a short longboard.

eqsusuevd.jcr:title: Even Keel Paddleboard
eqsusuevd.features: Incredibly stable 33 in. width offers stability that inspires confidence in beginning paddlers. EPS, epoxy and fiberglass construction reduces weight and creates high responsiveness
eqsusuevd.reviews: By djslalom from Lee Vining, CA The board was nice to get started, but now that I've gotten my stroke down, a left turn bias has become dramatically apparent. A fin box misalignment might be causing this. Finally, in less than a year, a bubble has appeared under the skin on the hull side (despite careful storage). Requests for a remedy from the manufacturer was deferred to the salesman, and both have become unresponsive. I would absolutely avoid this company and am spreading the word.
eqsusuevd.summary: Besides providing a new way to get on the water, paddleboarding develops core muscles and balance it's the perfect training activity for surfers, skiers and paddlers

eqsusurud.jcr:title: Rusty Parrot Shortboad
eqsusurud.features: Polyurethane, Balsa Wood Hand shaped High gloss finish
eqsusurud.reviews: By jonnywhite from bajasur little thick but super fast in all surf.. your great all around cali board. THANKS..
eqsusurud.summary: Currently our most popular high performance all around shortboard, the Rusty Parrot offers the same characteristics as what a pro would ride (fast, loose performance) but is made with slightly fuller dimensions to appeal to everyone.

eqsusuthd.jcr:title: The Stretch Longboard
eqsusuthd.features:
Longboard
3 fin
Polyurethane
Ideal Use
Waves: All around
Skill: Novice
eqsusuthd.reviews: By Nico from bluehawaii This is the ultimate beginner surfboard. The board is soft so if you bump yourself or anyone else with the surfboard it's not going to be that bad. The boards are very bouyant and catch waves easily. The foam does get a little slick once you're in the water, so sometimes your feet may slip if you don't have them well planted. If you're just starting out surfing and want something safe, this is the board to go with.
eqsusuthd.summary: The Stretch is agreat everyday longboard for beginners to intermediate surfers. It's extremely forgiving and balanced, which is great for beginners or more advanced surfers who just want an easy day of surfing.

eqsusutho.jcr:title: The Neutrino
eqsusutho.features: Polyurethane, Balsa Wood Hand shaped High gloss finish
eqsusutho.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review
eqsusutho.summary: With its pronounced rocker, the Neutrino is a natural choice for steep faces and on-rail surfing. Single concave gives the board plenty of drive for critical situations.
